item.title: AUTOMATIC LANDING SYSTEM (AUTOLAND) – TRIPLE CHANNEL AUTOLAND (LAND 3)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided approach minimums do not require its use.

note.para: The ASA indicates faults in the Automatic Landing System. The indications may be accompanied by other indications or EICAS messages regarding specific inoperative equipment. Use appropriate associated MEL sequences.

If a NO LAND 3 annunciation is displayed prior to departure and if no other indication or message are present, the aircraft may be dispatched with no maintenance action provided all three auto pilots can be independently engaged on the ground and approach minimums do not require triple channel autoland. Ground autopilot engagement should be done while the aircraft is parked.

numlitem.para: Downgrade aircraft category dispatch status to CAT 3a.

placard.para: Placard near the MCP APP Switch "NO LAND 3" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Deferral of this item requires downgrading to the status indicated in the A/C STATUS DISPATCH column below.
